#include <stdio.h>

#include <string.h>

int diff(int a[]) 

{

	int max = 0,min = 10000000,i;

	for(i = 0; i < 3; i++) {

		if(a[i] > max)

			max = a[i];

		if(a[i] < min)

			min = a[i];

		}

		return max - min + 1;

}

int value(char a[], int i) 

{

	if(a[i] == 'B')

		return 0;

	else if(a[i] == 'R')

	 	return 1;

	else

		 return 2;

}

int main() 

{

	char a[100001];

	int b[3] = {0};

	int s,i,k,min = 10000000;

	int t,l;

	scanf("%d",&t);

	while(t--) {

		min = 10000000;

		scanf("%s",a);

			b[0] = b[1] =b[2] = 0;

		l = strlen(a);

		for(i = 0; i < l; i++) {

			k = value(a,i);

			b[k] = i+1;

			if(b[0] != 0 && b[1] != 0 && b[2] != 0) {

				s = diff(b);

				if (s < min) {

					min = s;

				}

			}

			if(min == 3)

				break;
			
			

		}

		printf("%d\n",min );
		

	}

	return 0;

}
